name: work-redesign-platform
description: AI-powered work redesign workshop tool for SK Group managers

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.pilot: cd workshop-pilot-system && npx ts-node --project tsconfig.json run-pilot.ts
scripts.pilot:quick: cd workshop-pilot-system && npx ts-node --project tsconfig.json run-pilot.ts --personas 3
scripts.pilot:full: cd workshop-pilot-system && npx ts-node --project tsconfig.json run-pilot.ts --personas 30 --verbose

author: SK Academy
